mapper.select: SELECT id, name, telephone, email, company, post, address, logo_name AS logoName, user_id AS userId FROM card WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, name, telephone, email, company, post, address, logo_name AS logoName, user_id AS userId FROM card WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO card (name, telephone, email, company, post, address, logo_name, user_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{telephone}, #{email}, #{company}, #{post}, #{address}, #{logoName}, #{userId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM card WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
